code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from'./modules/rootReducer';import rootSaga from'./modules/rootSaga';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var enhancer=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'?compose(console.tron.createEnhancer(),applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)):applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware);var store=createStore(rootReducer,enhancer);sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
